# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/routingAppCoverage | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/routingAppCoverage 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/routingAppCoverage

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-routingAppCoverage#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/routingAppCoverage
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-routingAppCoverage#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionRoutingAppCoverageLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionroutingappcoveragelinkageresponse)`OK`
